What do you do in this map? You have to charge the enemy base with the bomb and plant.
How many player slots are in this map? 40
How many players on each team? 20
What's the goal of this map? To have fun and plant the bomb + defend to win.
How long did it take you to make this map? About 5 hours
What is the point of the helicopter? To give it more detail and to understand it.
What is the point of the water? So you cant just charge the castle and because its a moat.
What is the point of the bridge crossing the water? Because you cant have a moat without a draw bridge.
What is the point of the towers? to give you a look out and have shelter.

This Map is a Remake of my first course map: MG_IceQ_Course - Original Map

It's a way more detailed, even if it contains only Dev-Textures.
I really like the changes I've done and I'm proud of publishing it.
In the original map there were a lot of bugs which needed to be fixed.

This map requires the "Noblock-Plugin" to work properly.

There are 64+ player slots so it can easily go on any server.
There are 3 random sounds and 1 winning sound so the file size isn't that big.
There are about 10-15 different traps. This Map now has secrets!
This map will no longer be supported.

MG_IceQ_Course is the first map I've ever made.
It's a simple course map for cs:s.

The map contains 10 different levels to deal with.
Music: "Lana Del Rey - Summer Time Sadness (Remix)"

This map will no longer be supported.

"LoL this map is fun!" More than 90% of people playing this map say that the map is a big fun. Description There is the "deathwheel" in the middle of the map. It rotates and randomly moves to an area. The one who touches it looses (dies). There are 3 levels of difficulty. 1st level: It moves for about 1 second and idles up to 8 seconds
2nd level: It moves for 3 seconds and idles up to 5 seconds. The level starts after 1 minute.
3rd level: Same as the 2nd level, but the wheel gets a turbo every 5 seconds. Credits The music: Zombie Nation - Kraftwerk 400 Special thanks to Knister for some ideas and looping the backgroundmusic. EDIT: This map is FINAL now It has 30 SPAWNS and some fixed physic bugs. Also the 3rd level got fixed and can now be enjoyed very well.

It's like the Japanese TV-show, only now you will get to play it. You have to stay in live, jump into the shapes/holes in the wall, if you do not hit it correctly you will die. At the end you will have a knife fight with the winner of the opposite team. This is one of my old maps. - Enjoy!

It's like the Japanese TV-show, only now you will get to play it. You have to stay alive, jump into the shapes/holes in the wall, if you do not hit it correctly, then you will be pushed to the water and die. If you finish the map, then you will have a knife fight with the winners of the opposite team. There are 2 songs that are choosen randomly when the game starts, it is: Original Tetris song Guitar version of the Original Tetris song In "Assessments" it was not suppose to say "Teamplay" but "Looks" my bad, so consider that when you make a assessment! - Enjoy This is the sequel (2 version) of my original map: mg_humantetrix_final

Hulk model? - A random Zombie Mod I joined...?(please tell me If you know where)

How to Leave Comments:
If you have not played the map please DO NOT LEAVE A COMMENT, asserting I have stolen this map from other users is a false statement. Credit has BEEN given where it is needed.

General Facts:
The Hulk has enraged and is savaging destroying California City, The Government has one last option, the Special Opts, before they nuke the city.

Ct/Special Opts Objective:
After being briefed on the hulk's rampage you're sent into action to destroy the hulk, You hit the drop off point only to see the helicopter that you rode in on get destroyed, You're only objective is to destroy the hulk before the nuke is launched(ETA 3Minutes). ither destroy the Hulk or leave on the escape Copter...Or Die.

T/Hulk Objective:
After going into a fit of rage you destroy almost everyone in California City, when the Special Opts shows up and threatens your life you strike back with "Hulk Fist of Fury". Its Either destroy the Special Opts or leave on the escape Copter...Or Die.

FYI:
Nuke is Launched in 3 Minutes.
No Fall Damage.
According to how many Special Opts there are the Hulk gets a certain amount of HP.
Get Ammo from the Ammo Boxes at the drop off points.
Once 3 minutes have passed and the hulk is not dead/the special opts are not dead leave on the escape helicopter at the middle building.

Fix in Version 7:
Final version coming VERY SOON.
Fixed Switcher
Fixed round restart
Fixed Server crash.

Fixed the hulk hp caller
Fixed 

Fixed CT counter Chart Below:
# of Ct's      Hulk HP       Damage Hulk Does(excluding Knife)per sec
5		2000		30
10		3000		40
15		4000		50
You get the picture?

Fixed the Ct's after being the Hulk were still transparent.


Fixed the Hulk model so it stands closer to the terrorist to make them seem like one. =D


Fixed the floor bug. Thank you metagame community for all the great support =)

Watch the Video for Instruction Also.

mg hot feet v1

GamePlay

Users must jump at all times as if on an mp_bhops tile, if they stop at any moment they are sent off to be killed, both teams are given random weapons and are pitted against each other and kill while jumping!!!

Map Additions

If by any chance any user is in spawn after 6 second they will also be killed, at any moment during the map they enter anybody's spawn they will be killed :)

Please

Leave feedback on the map, and notify me of any bugs.

This map should hopefully have fixed most of the bugs in the original version.

Known bugs/fixes:
Most of the buttons have a standard texture.
The middle button works where you will not die by the AFK Killer.
The house level makes a little more sense on how to buy items.
The buttons should all lock when you hit one to stop 2 levels opening at once.  It may be possible by hitting them at the same time but it shouldn't happen.
The race map has been extended a little bit to make it a little bit more fun and challenging.
The are now two blocks on the pistols level to stop CT's throwing a few nades in to the stars area so all the T's don't get murdered in a flash.
The glass level now has a small room so you shouldn't fall in to the glass area.
The AFK killer also now sets once you hit a button except the middle one.  The downside though to this is that if no one goes to hit a button the killer won't kill the people.
Some areas were dark and now you can see them a bit better.

Now have fun killing each other.

***GET THE NEWEST VERSION OF THIS MAP***
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/100930

Its a fun minigame map with 9 levels. You have 30 seconds to choose a level or the spawn kill will get you.  Only the T's are allowed to choose.  This map also works best with noblock enabled.  This map was intended for fun not detail.

This is my first mg-map ever built, and my second map of all...
So don't be too harsh on your judgement..

Gameplay:
CT's and T's spawn on the opposite sides of eachother and need to find a way to kill the other team, whilst balancing in the air.

This can be done with the standard knife, or you could take a risk and try to get to a higher level for a grenade. With a little more endurance you can get an awp at the top of the level.

For those who fail in balancing... The game is not over yet!
You can still destroy the poles on which the platforms balance, aswell as the poles of the entire structure where the awp and grenades are on.

Also you could climb back up at one of the scaffoldings to give it another try!

While playing the map, be sure not to end up like a squashed potato by one of the platforms!

***UPDATE***

Listened to the feedback and made the scaffoldings solid. Meaning you can't slip off them anymore, though I liked the fact that the planks were movable. 
(Didn't make them ladders because the theme of the '3D-skybox' is scaffoldings aswell..)

Also I've added a lot more spawnpoints like Paul_Deagle suggested me, it supports up to 32 players now. It just fits in the map :P
Thanks to those who gave feedback and enjoy!

NOTE: I don't condone whale hunting/fishing in any way...

V2: (November 24th, 2012)

The map now changes the physics push scale to 1 each round, meaning shooting the whales or boats in some servers will no longer send them flying :)

3 songs added to play to, there's a 40% chance of the ambient noise being played, and 20% for each of the songs

Added some pictures and changed some of the hud hints to make the objective of the map more obvious

Changed how the button on the island is spawned, it should now be there every round, regardless of the outcome of the previous round

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

V1:
Everyone starts in a big room with a buy zone. Shooting/exploding each other does nothing, so don't waste your bullets or grenades.

Go in to the laser in the middle, the map then decides (using a counter system) whether you get teleported randomly to one of the 8 boats, or to the whale section of the start room (the number of spawns (50), means that there will always be a whale for the people teleported there to control).

Whales: Use left and right to turn, forward and back to tilt, and left click for boost. You can crush the players or land on/knock the sides of the boat to make the boat players fall in the water (which hurts them). The whales have 5000 health each. There are 7 controllable whales.

Boat players: Stay on your boat and shoot at the whales - though they are invincible for the first 30 seconds of the round or until someone controls them. There are 4 types of boats - a rowboat which can be controlled with the movement keys (ie WASD by default), a fishing boat with nets you can climb up to get back on, a raft which sits low enough that you can usually jump back up, and a basic yacht type of boat, which can also be controlled. There are 2 of each of the boat types. The idea is that your boat is either easy to get back on to, or can be moved out of the way of the whales. The controllable boats are meant to be sort of sluggish, too fast and players might fall off the back and the whales would not be able to keep up with the boats.

There is also an 8th whale which is controlled randomly by the map, it can turn left and right and "jump" out of the water to tip boats more easily.

An afk killer starts after 30 seconds. There are trigger_pushes to stop players, whales and boats from getting stuck against the outsides of the map.

After 2 minutes the glass around the centre island breaks and the boat players have 30 seconds to make it to the island and push the button in order to win

- Possible round endings -
 - All of the boat players die, and the whales win
 - The 8 whales are all destroyed, and the boat players win
 - The button on the middle island is pushed, and the boat players win
 - The boat players take longer than 2:30 and are killed, and the whales win

As the 'teams' in this map are the whales and the boat players, the winning 'team' is killed shortly after winning so the next round can start.

I don't intend to add any more whales or boats to the map unless it's too unbalanced for one team.

Made over about a month, meaning it's not as large as project as any of my other maps. And the focus was on making an enjoyable map, not so much realism. DO NOT DECOMPILE, any questions about how the map works just ask me the comments below...

Camera method (see screenshot 4) discovered by charli, without it the map would not be nearly as easy to play for the people controlling the whales ;)

~ An updated version of v1, which you can still access from my gamebanana profile page ~

Randomised, selects one of 15 races at the start of each round. There are a few secrets, almost all of which are at the spawn.

~~~

Updates to the original include:

-A few different songs (ie, less trance than before)

-The "Boats" racing minigame has been removed. Having 2 camera screens meant the server could only update one at a time, so the projections were too laggy.

-The "Boats" racing minigame has been replaced by a new minigame, "Chase", where one team must try and survive for 90 seconds (without weapons), and the other teams has to try and work together to knife them.

-Everything has generally been made "more obvious" to the players, but the major changes include: arrows showing where to go for the "Hard" race, a sign for the jail in "Escape", arrows and some easier to reach guns in "Flying" (the one with the smoke and the wings), semi-transparent red glass on the "Future City" level (the glass shows you where you can climb up, the texture is a ladder), the entire levels of "Points" and "Arena" have both been redone, players should now have less trouble finding out where to go or what to do, the time spent in the spawn room has been increased, so players have longer to read the hints for the selected race (if applicable).

~~~

Known issues:
CTF is sort of laggy, but the entity method I used stops people delaying, as well as letting them see clearly what to do.

Another issue that might arise with a lot of players is the map thinking someone has a CTF flag when they actually don't have one attached to them (this is due to the delay in touching the trigger and picking up the smoke grenade with the parented flag). Despite not having a flag, they will still be able to score and win the round.

The final issue is that the music quality is lower than what I would have liked. I would have preferred to have better quality music instead, but when I uploaded the original, some users complained about the file size.

~~~

Music credits are in-game, shown as HUD hints on the right-hand side of the screen.

~~~

Do not post this map on other sites and claim it as your own, do not upload it on other map-making sites, if you want to know how part of the map was made, please post here and I will answer within a few days.

~~~

I finished making this about 2 weeks ago (ie, before Hammer was temporarily killed by Valve), but I haven't had time to upload it until now. Please rate and comment :)

Also, mg-hn-whaledefencev2 has already been released (the link is on my gamebanana profile). Instead of a dedicated upload, I just edited the original submission, so not many people knew about the change.

And if you add this to your server, can you please give me a heads up? Something in the comments, a post on my gamebanana profile, or a PM, anything's fine :)

Everyone starts in a big room, a map/stage/level gets picked and is shown on the wall, some of them have tips/instructions.

There are 15 maps and 8 songs (9 if you count one which is really unlikely to play) - song credits are displayed as hud hints.

There are 9 secrets in total, gl finding them all though...

The races are:
- Around the world
- Arena
- Capture the Flag
- Escape
- Underwater
- Space
- Flying
- Normal difficulty
- Hard difficulty
- Double deathrun
- Maze (yes I know it's a cliche in mg)
- Points
- Treasure Hunt
- Future City (sort of based on DICE's Mirror's Edge)
- Boats

Yer I know there's no 3d skybox for "Future city", when I put one in looking directly at the sun caused the sun to disappear temporarily, it's not hdr either because I didn't like the lighting effects and it slows down framerate

Do not decompile please, I didn't spend almost 3 months on this to have someone take it apart and claim it as their own work/ideas. I know I can't stop you from taking the concepts in it though (such as the flying or boats), so I guess you can do that...

A map for Counter-Strike: Source, made by me, HandsomeNick

Introduction:
=============

**CT attacking, T defending:** When a genius scientist loses her wedding ring down the drain, she uses her shrink-ray on a group of willing friends to send them after it. They return with bad news - underground live a hostile community that are now attempting to keep the ring for themselves. With her husband returning from his business trip in only a few hours, the desperate scientist does the obvious - she hires an SAS team to shrink down and take back the ring - by force.

**T attacking, CT defending:** A large community of tiny people have made their homes in a now-abandoned section of the Handsomeville sewer network. With few possessions from the surface, they place enormous significance on these items, and are willing to protect them with their lives. Recently, intel has discovered that a locally-based terrorist network has gained access to a shrinking machine, and that they are intending to loot the community of its most prized treasure - the golden ring, located in the heart of the town.

~~~

After preparing themselves for battle, both sides make use of the sewer's pipe system and enter the town from above, expecting nothing less than a fight to the very end.

The round ends when either team has all players killed, after 4 minutes have passed (which kills the attackers), or when the attacking team gets close enough to the ring, which is located in the building with the green light above it.

~~~ v1b1 Release ~~~
====================
- First release of map
- Released early to allow others to search for gameplay issues
- Notable absences: No spawn/afk killer
- There is no time limit for the attackers
- The map has hardly been optimised
- The lighting has not been done properly
- Most textures are not properly aligned
- Very few buildings are complete, and many are lacking the appropriate detail
- The bathrooms aren't finished
- The starting camera is not where I would like it to be

~~~ v1b2 Release ~~~
====================
- Competition version
- Very little optimising, only done with lightmap levels atm
- Lighting is there, but it could be better
- 2 secrets
- 2 semi-secrets (which have some influence on gameplay)
- Spawn killers and a timelimit of 4 minutes for the attacking team
- Music may be included in a future version, but more secrets definitely will be

Note:
==================
Please understand that this map is not entirely finished. As it was my first entry into a gamebanana competition, I made the mistake of trying to complete a massive map in a relatively short amount of time, so most details are missing. I will try and make an optimised, completed version when I have the time.

Previous version is here: http://gamebanana.com/maps/161721

Includes 33 obstacles, 50 slots, spawn + first section (obstacles 1-20) killer activates after about 4.5 minutes, increased from the previous 90 seconds. 

The round timelimits mean that those that die in the first section get to watch the others complete the rest of the map, and hopefully win (I figured it wouldn't be very enjoyable to finish the map and then find out no-one saw you do it).

Other changes include environment rock textures scaled down, 2 of the secrets being moved, almost all visual/graphics errors fixed, the "one at a time" obstacle teleports now rather than killing, and some of the more repetitive obstacles at the start have been replaced (see screenshots 3 and 4, though 2 others were also replaced). I chose not to add sprites to help with lighting because I figured it wouldn't make much difference, and the focus is on the map's gameplay anyway.

The overall round timelimit has remained the same though, it is meant to be challenging to finish. As stated before, the time for the first 20 obstacles is more than enough for several attempts per player per round, though to finish the map, a player needs a near flawless run :)

Please do not decompile, if you want to know how I made an obstacle I will explain it in the comments for you :)
 - I made a new submission so the ratings and comments wouldn't be skewed how they were even with the changes...

NEW VERSION NOW AVAILABLE WITH NUMEROUS FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS: http://gamebanana.com/css/maps/166721

Includes 33 different obstacles/puzzles and 4 songs in total.

The map is divided in to sections, if you fall behind you die. It takes about 7:00 to complete from start to finish, but most rounds will probably take 2:30-4:00 minutes. Some of the obstacles have tricks to completing them without taking damage, and two are randomised for each round. The obstacles more or less get harder as the map goes on.

The spawn closes after 1:30 at the same time as the first 10 obstacles/puzzles

Song credits are in the map, on the left side of the spawn room

Please rate and leave comments AFTER downloading and playing

(DO NOT DECOMPILE, if you want to know how I made something, post a comment and I will answer eventually :))

New in this version compared to mg_Hide_n_Seek_Office;
  • Switched from using targetnames and trigger_hurts when shooting as a seeker to a point_hurt, it's now impossible to take damage unless you actually shoot.
  • Fixed some props that wouldn't recieve the correct lighting.
  • Seekers now get glocks rather than a knife/shotguns to prevent people from auto-shooting without taking any damage (use burst fire for best effect, won't die by right clicking anymore).
  • The outside lighting is a bit off on the office part compared to the real cs_office, this is because you can only use one light_environment per map, so I went with the one from assault.
This will probably be the last version of the map, unless I find better ways to do things. Enjoy!

MG_HideNSeek_Artimus_Fixed
-----------------------------
Map has been pakratted; screenshots attached.

Objective:

Kill your opponents by tracking their light trails (they will be the opposite color of yours: CT = Blue, T = Red). Have fun and good luck!

This is a fix for my previous version of this map
Changes include: - removed the elevator and replaced it with a ladder
 - less time to hide, more time to seek
 - adjusted lounge cushions as falling between them was annoying players

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The map is hide and seek between the two teams.
The starting room/lobby is merely to decide which team hides, and which seeks.
Map credits are in the map
Please do not directly copy any aspect of this map for your own use (except for the hide and seek aspects and the player selection method at the start)

If I have not credited you for a texture, please leave a comment below telling me.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I got this map idea from playing "backalley_run_v2". Basically, one team is chosen to defend the a tower, while the other team is trying to attack it. The team defending the tower has a scout and 100hp. The team attacking the tower has a choice of 200hp or a USP.

After 1 minute, an afk killer will activate and after 3 minutes the team defending the tower will be allowed to leave the tower. 

There are about 10 guns scattered around the map on different buildings (all pistols and 1 AWP). And many smoke grenades all over the place.

I'm afraid on how the gameplay will be, but if the teams are too uneven, then I will simply make a v2.
Small mini game where you must venture and find weapons for 20 seconds then be teleported into a small dust map to fight.

This is a medium-paced map that only takes a matter of seconds to figure out, the goal for the Counter-Terrorists that spawn in the middle, is to avoid the grenades that two Terrorists will be throwing at them, avoid them until the time is up or get blown into pieces. Thanks to skillor for creating his HE_give_boxes prefab or this map wouldn't of been! http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/3860 Thanks skillor!
Aswell many thanks to Instant b0b for his awesome texture pack!

This map will be best for a minigame server and will ensure plenty of replay and loads of fun.

If not already, I would suggest turning off auto team balance (mp_autoteambalance 0) and changing the team limit (mp_limitteams 40) depending on the server size.
Please leave all pros and cons and what you would like to see in the future for this map! Feel free to edit and repost the map as long as you mention my name and if using the prefabs, mention 'skillor'. and if keeping the current textures, mention "Instant b0b"!
